EREN regularly hosts virtual lunch and learn sessions in which members meet to discuss timely topics and share knowledge. Below are links to Google Drive folders containing resources from these sessions.

## Session Links

- [9/8/23: Youth Evaluation](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/11LwLjLWV84JwTtzej3K22XIVTyNJJsWf?usp=drive_link)

- [5/19/23: Data Literacy](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1k79isVmnEqYXBMRYMRfWFR9uQ-uh99jg?usp=drive_link)

- [3/17/23: Hot Topics](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ytWmT--H5ymBnM98AgoFNUvBuSeFulIN?usp=drive_link). Topics covered in this session include integrating program evaluations into established frameworks, promising tools for quantitative and qualitative analysis, chronic absenteeism, and VVAAS.

- [1/20/23: Hot Topics](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/111_CbFE4wwGQFG022LTyht8Usctlv3-u?usp=drive_link). Topics covered in this session include longitudinal analysis in the era of disrupted schooling, appropriate use of climate survey data, and balancing strategic priorities with ad hoc requests.
